name: Ant-Min
description:
This is the story of a little boy called little Timmy. Little Timmy is very fond of ants. One day, whilst admiring the little ants in his little antfarm, he suddenly notices everything growing bigger and bigger. Wait a second, things weren't getting bigger, little Timmy was getting smaller and smaller! Trapped inside the now humongous antfarm, little timmy has to find a way to escape!

-Game Controles-

WASD - To Move
Left Mouse Button- To Interact
Right Mouse Button- Turn Camera
Scroll Wheel- Zoom In/Out
F - Command Ants to follow the player
G- Command Ants to wait

-Credit-
Goosam: System Design/Programming
Khaled Bawaneh: Level Design
Mortal: Art & Assets

NOTE:
This is our first game and the game is currently in a unfinished state you might not even be able to complete the game.

Totally not a pikmin copy
